What is DS & AI @IIT-Guwahati?

  • This is an unofficial page. Do not use this data. Go to official site
Our vision is to establish ourselves as a place of academic excellence in Data Science (DS) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) by adopting an interdisciplinary approach towards imparting quality education and pursuing R&D, at the confluence of science, engineering, and humanities. In this quest, we aim for
  • Innovating in research and technology development in frontier areas of DS&AI.
  • Nurturing curious brains and build a talent pool which solves challenging problems with DS&AI.

Recent Highlights

2022-26 Batch Undergraduates join the School

We are delighted to welcome the 2022 batch of BTech students into School of DS&AI. They will join hands with the diverse group of faculty, students, and staff of the School in the quest to dive deeper, making an impact to make our world a better place.

The new joinees come from different parts of India after demonstrating their talents by excelling in the competitive IIT JEE (all India examination). The School hosted an orientation meet for the students on 27 Oct 2022.

Reinforcement learning for mobile edge computing system

In an Internet of Things (IoT) based network, tasks arriving at individual nodes can be processed in-device or at a local Mobile Edge Computing (MEC) server. This project focuses on the optimal resource allocation problem for tasks arriving in an MEC-based IoT network. To address the high complexities of achieving optimality, we aim to develop low-complexity task scheduling schemes. Moreover, we aim to adopt Reinforcement Learning (RL) based approaches that can learn the optimal policy by interacting with the environment. The performance of the RL-based schemes will be evaluated in system-level simulators. More details can be found in this paper on a related work of ours, and a presentation on the same is available here.

Analysis of facial tissue movements using AI

The eye and facial movements are important to humans because they convey subtle information about a person’s mental state (e.g., attention, intention, emotion) and physical state (e.g., age, health, fatigue). These movements, which generate facial expressions, are carefully scrutinized by humans in social settings. In our lab, we are focused on developing Artificial Intelligence (AI)-based systems for measuring, modeling, and animating eye gaze and facial tissue deformations for applications in healthcare and computer animation. We use high frame rate vision systems to capture human faces and apply data-driven approaches to analyze and model facial expressions. In the healthcare sector, facial movement analysis can be used to develop tools for rapid assessments of mental health and to build patient-computer interaction systems. In computer graphics, we can create real-time and hyper-realistic computer-generated animations of human eyes and faces in creating convincing and interactive animation characters.

We continue to design and offer new (advance) courses

We know teaching and learning feed each other. Our Faculty have designed specialized courses in DS & AI which they enjoy to teach, and also help student gain the depth and breadth in this exciting field.

Campus gets another supercomputer

Named "Param Kamrup", this is a 838 Terra FLOPS super computer with 107 CPU nodes, 10 GPU nodes, 9 high memory nodes, 740 CPU cores, and several CUDA cores. Our data scientists are getting ready to crunch numbers with these machines! To know about the HPC facility in campus.

Our People

DS & AI at IIT Guwahati unites faculty working in various topics related to Data Science and AI, and features a well equipped group of researchers designing solutions for challenging problems facing India and the world.

Learn with Us

In the vibrant campus of IIT Guwahati, our students work closely with faculty, learning and designing solutions for all the "whys and why nots".

Partner with Us

We began in 2021. We are the door to the North-East India. We'd love to work with you, too. We envision to collaborate with some of the biggest names in AI research — technical companies, non-profits and other universities.

Join Us

We're using DS & AI to solve challenging problems, but we can't do it without the best people and resources. Engage with us.
